name: RemoteConfiguration
title: Remote Configuration
author: Xorimuth
description:
Allows the player to configure any machine from the map, without allowing item transfer so it maintains the vanilla feel.
Allows wire placement and entity copy/paste at any distance.
Press R to issue a rotation request, right-click to mark for deconstruction.

Less cheaty alternative to Far Reach. Similar to Space Exploration's Navigation Satellite, but works entirely within map view.
